relation: The weather is very cold and good time for honeymoon and winter sports. Snowfall is a regular occurrence and it is advisable for children and the aged group to avoid visiting during this month.

Cold climate continues to dominate the region. The skies are mostly clear and cool winds maintains the chill in the air. Perfect time for honeymoon and many adventure activities. Snowfall will continue till the middle of this month.

The mercury starts to rise, making it ideal for holidaying for both adults and kids. Sunshine is plenty but cool winds maintain the temperature. The place is most beautiful during this month. Snowfallhas completely stopped but there will be snow on the ground.

The weather starts to get warmer with cool days and chilly nights. Plenty of blue sky and favorable winds makes it an ideal time for indulging in aerosports. For snow tourists need to go higher on the mountains.

The weather is moderate. Days are warm while nights are cool and is best for enjoying local attractions and having picnics at the lake and grasslands. Snow is elusive on the ground and can be enjoyed only on high altitudes.

Monsoon begins to set in, making the days warmer and evenings pleasant. The city may be very crowded as people come here to take refuge from the heat that grips North India. For enjoying snow, tourists need to go on altitudes which can be reached only via trekking.
The weather is good for sightseeing and regular rainfall is received, bringing the temperature down. Adventures should be avoided but the natural beauty is worth enjoying at this time of the year.
Occasion rainfalls occur. The days are warm but nights get cooler. Might not the best time for visiting and unexpected landslides occur in this region.
Rainfall has almost stopped and will completely vanish by the end of the month. The temperature start to dip and is ideal for sightseeing. Adventures too can be enjoyed.
The weather is cool during the day but nights can be cold. Light woolens are recommended. Best time for adventures and sightseeing. One of the best months to visit Kullu.

Winter dawns in the region and temperatures start to lower. Ideal for adventure and sightseeing. Woolens are a must and the skies are dominated by clear clouds and plenty of sunshine. Due to the onset of winters the mountains peak start to get blanketed by snow and tourists can enjoy snow on the mountains slopes.

Temperature can go down to sub zero levels making it ideal for honeymoon. Children and old people are advised to skip visiting during this moth. Snowfall can be enjoyed at higher altitudes, at the end of the month.
